snippet.title: RIVE - Epic Conclusion Trailer
snippet.description: This is it! After more than 15 years of hard work and gallons of blood, sweat and tears, we have decided that RIVE will be Two Tribes’ final game. Two Tribes will remain operational, but we won't make any more games after RIVE. Why? Check our blog: http://twotribes.com/message/rive-is-our-final-game
